file.name: authconfigs.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: '@viron/lib authconfigs'
  description: authconfigs api specifications

tags:
  - name: vironAuthConfig

paths:
  /viron/authconfigs:
    get:
      operationId: listVironAuthconfigs
      tags:
        - vironAuthConfig
      summary: list auth configs
      description: 認証設定を取得する
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAuthConfigList'

components:
  schemas:
    VironAuthConfigList:
      type: object
      properties:
        list:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAuthConfigItems'
        oas:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAuthConfigOas'
      required:
        - list

    VironAuthConfigItems:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/VironAuthConfig'

    VironAuthConfig:
      type: object
      properties:
        provider:
          description: 認証プロバイダ
          type: string
          example: google
        type:
          description: 認証方式
          type: string
          enum:
            - email
            - oauth
            - signout
          example: oauth
        operationId:
          description: クライアントがリクエストするAPIのOperationID
          type: string
          example: signinEmail
        defaultParametersValue:
          description: クライアントからリクエストする際のパラメータ
          type: object
          properties: {}
        defaultRequestBodyValue:
          description: クライアントからリクエストする際のリクエストボディ
          type: object
          properties: {}
      required:
        - provider
        - type
        - operationId

    VironAuthConfigOas:
      description: listで返されるopeation群が定義されたoas
      type: object
      properties: {}
